languages.text: {n}Сломленный слуга смотрит на вас ненавидящим взглядом.{/n} "Ты все равно не помешаешь господину. Не следуй за ним... Лучше беги прочь".
{n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."
languages.original_text: {n}Сломленный слуга смотрит на вас ненавидящим взглядом.{/n} "Ты все равно не помешаешь господину. Не следуй за ним... Лучше беги прочь".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}老仆拄着残破不堪的身躯，以充满仇恨的眼神看着你。{/n}“反正你也阻止不了我的主人。不要跟着他了……你最好逃得远远的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."

traits.locale_text: {n}老仆拄着残破不堪的身躯，以充满仇恨的眼神看着你。{/n}“反正你也阻止不了我的主人。不要跟着他了……你最好逃得远远的。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}壊れた召使は、嫌悪感たっぷりの目で睨み付けてくる。{/n}「あなたはどうせ、ご主人様を止められません。あのお方を追わないでください…逃げる方が賢明です」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."

traits.locale_text: {n}壊れた召使は、嫌悪感たっぷりの目で睨み付けてくる。{/n}「あなたはどうせ、ご主人様を止められません。あのお方を追わないでください…逃げる方が賢明です」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}El sirviente, ahora un hombre totalmente destrozado, te mira con odio en los ojos.{/n} «De todas formas no detendrá a mi amo. No le siga... Será mejor que huya».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sirviente, ahora un hombre totalmente destrozado, te mira con odio en los ojos.{/n} «De todas formas no detendrá a mi amo. No le siga... Será mejor que huya».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Der Diener, der nun ein gebrochener Mann ist, blickt dich mit hasserfüllten Augen an.{/n} "Ihr werdet meinen Meister ohnehin nicht aufhalten. Folgt ihm nicht ... Flieht lieber."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Diener, der nun ein gebrochener Mann ist, blickt dich mit hasserfüllten Augen an.{/n} "Ihr werdet meinen Meister ohnehin nicht aufhalten. Folgt ihm nicht ... Flieht lieber."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur, physiquement brisé, vous lance un regard plein de haine.{/n} « De toute façon, vous ne pourrez pas arrêter mon maître. Ne le suivez pas... Non, vous feriez mieux de fuir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur, physiquement brisé, vous lance un regard plein de haine.{/n} « De toute façon, vous ne pourrez pas arrêter mon maître. Ne le suivez pas... Non, vous feriez mieux de fuir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}İradesi kırılan hizmetkâr, nefret dolu gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Zaten efendimi durduramayacaksın. Peşine düşme... Kaç, daha iyi."
languages.original_text: {n}The servant, now a broken man, looks at you with hatred in his eyes.{/n} "You won't stop my master anyway. Don't follow him... Better run away."
